name: swg-forge-config
description: Shared workspace settings for all SWG Forge extensions

swgForge.serverScriptsPath.markdownDescription:
Path to server Lua scripts directory, relative to workspace root.

This folder contains `object/`, `managers/`, and `custom_scripts/`.

**Examples:**
- `infinity_wicked/MMOCoreORB/bin/scripts` (Infinity active dev)
- `Core3/MMOCoreORB/bin/scripts` (standard SWGEmu)

swgForge.serverConfPath.markdownDescription:
Path to server configuration directory, relative to workspace root.

Contains `config-local.lua` and other server config files.

swgForge.customScriptsFolder.markdownDescription:
Name of the custom scripts subfolder inside the server scripts directory.

This is where all custom Lua work goes. Set to empty string if you put custom code directly in the scripts folder.

swgForge.tre.workingPath.markdownDescription:
Path to the **editable** TRE working directory, relative to workspace root.

This is the ONLY TRE folder where files are created or modified. All other TRE folders are read-only references.

swgForge.tre.vanillaPath.markdownDescription:
Path to the **read-only** vanilla SOE TRE directory, relative to workspace root.

Contains extracted original game assets for reference.

swgForge.tre.referencePath.markdownDescription:
Path to the **read-only** server-specific TRE directory, relative to workspace root.

Contains extracted server-customized assets. On Infinity this is `tre/infinity`, other servers may use a different name.
